DOC.brief_title: Diet Lifestyle Intervention Study Postpartum Women China
DOC.detailed_description: The current multicenter RCT conduct three representative area China , Shandong province , Hubei province Guangdong province , locate northern , central southern part China , respectively . Women attend routine pregnancy diagnosis hospital maternal healthcare center invite take part study . At least 800 woman meet eligibility criterion recruit randomly assign intervention group ( n > =400 ) control group ( n > =400 ) . A three-dimension comprehensive intervention strategy , incorporate intervention measure simultaneously individual postpartum woman , family member community environment , utilized maximize effectiveness intervention . Regular visit follow-up do group ; nutrition health-related measurement assess intervention .
